resources.string:
"Zitong Wang


" "Basic usage

" "Click the + button to add a new stock by company code to your list.

" "Once a stock code is entered, click the + button again to request its information.

" "Upon successful information retrieval, you can choose to customize the company name that " "will show up in your list, then click the checkmark button to proceed.

" "To Delete a record, swipe left. 


" "ToDos

" "Add refresh functionality to existing records


" "APIs used:

" "Twelve Data : Quote and Real-Time Price, free-tier

" "Clearbit : Logo"
